title: Blended Learning Education on Electroconvulsive Therapy (ECT) for Treating Geriatric Depression

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in psychiatry and understanding of geriatric depression
context.additional_context: Graduate-level blended learning program conducted in a BYOD environment, combining online modules and offline practical sessions

learning_goals: Learners can explain the criteria for applying ECT in geriatric depression treatment with over 80% accuracy
Learners can identify three major risk factors and propose mitigation strategies when designing ECT treatment protocols
Learners can establish ECT treatment plans with over 70% completeness by analyzing real clinical cases through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
